author: portuguesas
title: Carvi hotel staff !!
text: Carvi hotel staff were so accommodating I've stayed all over New York Lexington hotel intern continental, w hotel ,and many more high end hotel this one was booked so I could literally just have a bed to sleep in as I had to go to hospital I'm British and returning home soon the hotel staff made my stay so awesome I will return ! Best hotel ever x thank u !!!! Xx love miss Emin
